column5: Hey guys. I plan on hitting the Bog a lot more this year. Mostly for LMB of course, but I'd really like to catch my first musky. Whereabouts on the lake would I have the best chance of hooking one.  Thanks,  Curt
when we go to stoney i usually catch one or two without trying but if i do want 1 is use big top water in the morning nothing better then top water musky, usually weed flats in the morning are good
